title: Rename legend label 'Candle (day)' to 'Shots (day)' in Straight Shot Trend Graph

requirements.text: In StraightShotTrendChart.tsx, change the legend label for the candlestick series from 'Candle (day)' to 'Shots (day)'. No other changes to this file or any other file.

quotes: On the straight shots Stats tab, the Straight Shot Trend Graph only, I would like in the legend for "Candle (day)" to say "Shots (day)"

acceptanceCriteria: The legend in the Straight Shot Trend Graph displays 'Shots (day)' instead of 'Candle (day)'
No other UI, logic, or files are modified

constraints: No other UI or interface changes
nonGoals: Changing any chart logic or data processing
Modifying any other component or page
